attributes.title: Isle of Arran Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Located close to Brodick Castle.   Opened late March 2000.  Ales include Blond and Dark.  Arran Brewing Company has called in the administrators after running into cashflow problems. Graham Martin and Laurie Manson of PricewaterhouseCoopers were appointed as joint administrators to the company early in May 2008.
